content: i wrote this hat pattern when i was wanting a knit hat for myself i love the look of 2x1 ribbing the simplicity of stockinette and a nice slouch it comes in 3 sizes so you can knit one for everyone you love it s my perfect everyday hat and i hope it will be yours too if you love this pattern and want to support more free designs like this one consider donating a cup of coffee https //ko-fi com/madebyemknits thank you you re welcome to sell hats made using my pattern if you re selling online credit me as the designer and provide a link back to the pattern listing if you re selling in person credit me as the designer on the item s tag
